alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 7:53AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jackson County through 830 AM CDT... At 753 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ocean Springs, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocean Springs, Moss Point, Escatawpa, Gautier, Wade, Big Point, Helena, Gulf Hills, Hurley, Vancleave, Hickory Hills, Latimer and Gulf Park Estates. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 51 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southern Mississippi.
